title: "Schedule"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(xtable)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r}
t = read_csv("~/Downloads/CSHL 2023 Planning Sheet - Schedule.csv")
t |> 
  select(c(1,2,4,5,8,9)) |>
  filter(!is.na(Start)) |>
  kable() |> 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F, position = "left")
```
